description: This sticky and sweet brussels sprouts make a tasty vegetarian fake away side dish.
name: Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the caramelised brussels sprouts in a large bowl, pour over the sauce and toss to coat. Serve with chopped cashews and spring onions on top.
